pavane jāta rukkhānam nānā phala rasa uttamam
tasmim gandha rasam ojam buddha seṭṭhassa pūjitam
pūjemi paṭhamam tassa paṇidhānam a cintiyam
tato sāla vane ramme jāta ṭṭhānam carimakam
apparājita pallaṅkam buddham buddha guṇam name
pūjemi dasa bala ñāṇam catu vesārajjam uttamam
yamaka pāṭihīram ca ñāṇam sabbaññutam pi ca
tato ca satta sattāhe dhamma sammasitam name
brahmunā yācita ṭṭhānam dhammam desayitum varam
tatas veḷu vana ārāme vasita ṭhānam ca pūjaye
tatas jetavanam rammam cira vuttham mahesinā
tatas ca himavantasmin mahā samaya desanam
catur āsīti sahassehi dhamma kkhandhehi saṅgaham
piṭakattayam yathā vutta vidhinā pūjayām aham
mārassa attanaḥ āyu saṅkhāra usajjanam name
cira gatā mahā karuṇā na nibbāyittha

original: Svāyaṃ dhammo vinayo ca desito sādhukaṃ mayā,
analyzed: su ayam dhammo vinayo ca desito sādhukam mayā

original: Mamaccayena so satthā dhātu cāpi sarīrajā.
analyzed: mamaccayena so satthā ca api sarīra jā
mamaccayena satthā ti anujāni mahā muni

original: Tasmā hi tassa saddhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā yathātathaṃ,
analyzed: tasmā hi tassa saddhammam uggaṇhitvā yathātatham

original: Yo deseti sambuddho ti natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ deseti sambuddhaḥ ti natvāna pūjayām aham
tasmā sāsapa mattam pi jina dhātum
yam yam bhagavā patta cīvaram ādikam

original: Yattha katthaci sayito āsinno caṅkamepi vā,
analyzed: yattha katthaci sayitaḥ āsinnaḥ caṅkame pi vā

original: Na sañjānanti ye buddhaṃ evarūpo ti ñātve,
analyzed: na sañjānanti ye buddham evarūpaḥ ti ñātve

original: Kataṃ taṃ paṭimaṃ sabbaṃ natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
analyzed: katam tam paṭimam sabbam natvāna pūjayāmaham
evam buddham ca dhammam ca saṅgham ca anuttaram
asmin ca pubbe pi ca attabhāve

original: Paññā ca me sijjhatu yāva bodhiṃ.
analyzed: paññā ca me sijjhatu yāva bodhim

original: Bhogo ca kāyo ca mamesa laddho,
analyzed: bhogo ca kāyo ca mama isa laddho
dāne rataḥ sīla guṇe su sāṇṭhitaḥ
